messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] TV-and sleeping....
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/7/03 06:21:49 AM Central Standard Time, pennacres@redshift.bc.ca writes: I have been in hospitals where they had  pillow
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/7/03 06:21:49 AM Central Standard Time,
pennacres@... writes:
I have been in hospitals where they had "pillow speakers"-little speaker
disks under 3" wide that you slip under your pillow. Can they be bought
anywhere? I always thought they were great. Sure wish people had used them a couple
of years ago when I had back surgery-the noise from TV's in that area was
unbelievable.
grace
############

You can go to your local Radio Shack and get them for $3.99 + tax. The sku is
33-306.
~Nancy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

I have been in hospitals where they had "pillow speakers"-little speaker disks under 3" wide that you slip under your pillow. Can they be bought anywhere? I always thought they were great. Sure wish people had used them a couple of years ago when I had back surgery-the noise from TV's in that area was unbelievable.
